attributes.documentation:
@notice   Returns an address of the toon author. 0x0 if
          the toon has been created by us.
attributes.name: authorAddress

attributes.documentation:
@notice   Returns maximum supply. In other words there will
          be never more toons that that number. It has to
          be constant.
          If there is no limit function returns 0.
attributes.name: maxSupply

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation: Returns amount of wei that given address is able to withdraw.

attributes.documentation: Add pending withdrawal for an address.

 Does NOT transfer ownership of token.

 @param _tokenId - ID of NFT on auction.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns true if the NFT is on auction.
 @param _auction - Auction to check.
attributes.name: _isOnAuction

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns current price of an NFT on auction. Broken into two
  functions (this one, that computes the duration from the auction
  structure, and the other that does the price computation) so we
  can easily test that the price computation works correctly.
attributes.name: _currentPrice

attributes.documentation:
@dev Computes the current price of an auction. Factored out
  from _currentPrice so we can run extensive unit tests.
  When testing, make this function public and turn on
  `Current price computation` test suite.
attributes.name: _computeCurrentPrice

attributes.documentation:
@dev Computes owner's cut of a sale.
 @param _price - Sale price of NFT.
attributes.name: _computeCut
